snippet: Fatima Khan’s search for justice for her son, Dr. Abbas Khan, who died in a Syrian government prison, has become a quest for public accountability.
abstract: Fatima Khan’s search for justice for her son Dr Abbas Khan, who died in a Syrian government prison in December, has become a quest for public accountability from government she contends killed him; Khan says her son's only offense was treating Syrians in rebel-held areas.
lead_paragraph: Fatima Khan’s search for justice for her son, Dr. Abbas Khan, who died in a Syrian government prison, has become a quest for public accountability.

headline.main: A British Doctor’s Death in Syria, and His Mother’s Quest for Justice
headline.print_headline: A British Doctor’s Death in Syria, and His Mother’s Quest for Justice

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
